intro: Black Border 2 is an intense border patrol simulator where you inspect documents and use special tools to detect forgeries and stop smugglers.
description:
Ready to become a Border Police Officer? Step into the world of Black Border 2 and experience the intense pressure of national security. As a Customs Officer, your duty is to protect the nation from illegal smuggling and Check the Papers, Please! 

Inspect passports, scrutinize documents, and use advanced tools to make life-or-death decisions in this gripping police simulator game.

Take on the duty of a Border Patrol Agent and protect your nation's borders. Your role is crucial and you Must Check every Papers, Please:

Document Inspection: Meticulously check passports, permits, and papers to approve or reject entrants.

Advanced Tools: Utilize X-ray scanners to reveal hidden items and weigh stations to check vehicle legitimacy.

Canine Unit: Deploy your loyal service dog to sniff out concealed contraband and uncover secrets.

Strategic Decisions: Every choice you make impacts the safety of your country.
